original_title: The Courage of Kavik, the Wolf Dog
overview: The story of a champion Eskimo sled dog named Kavik who survives a plane crash in the wilds of Alaska and is found and cared for by a young boy named Andy Evans. But the dog's owner finds Kavik and takes him back to his home in Colorado where the dog escapes and embarks on a 2,000-mile odyssey in search of Andy.
tagline: A boy and his sled dog against the elements.
title: The Courage of Kavik, the Wolf Dog
